description.english: Let's do this the hard way.
Defeat all bosses found in the main campaign.
Complete "The Far Shore" with no casualties on Hardmode.
Complete "The Orpheum" with no casualties on Hardmode.
Complete "The Garden" with no casualties on Hardmode.

displayName.english: God is Dead and We Have Killed Him

description.english: Humiliate a boss by killing it with a slap.

displayName.english: God of Phalanges, Palms and Pain

description.english: Humiliate every boss by killing them with a slap.
Have one of your party member's head be reduced to a fine red mist.
Watch SmoothSkin's trauma be his undoing.
Defeat the Charcarrion by letting its corpse decompose.
Defeat the final boss without Nowak in your active party.
Lose a party member to Pigment overflow.
Lose a party member to your own party...
Lose a party member to using the wrong Pigment.

displayName.english: It Happens to the Best of Us

description.english: Defeat the final boss in under 45 minutes.
Complete all areas with no casualties on Hardmode.
This longest and strangest dream comes to an end.
Have Nowak be the lone survivor of an encounter with the Witness.
Have a party member die to damage dealt by the Divine twice during an encounter with the Divine.
Fully explore all zones in Hardmode.
Hire all 3 party members from the Fools Board.
Complete a difficult encounter before any enemies can act.
Complete a combat encounter without any party members performing an ability.
